PGIMER Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Project Nurse Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 20, 2025, 09:39 IST
 Postgraduate Institute of Medical Education and Research
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 20-Aug-2025 |  Chandigarh |  Salary : 20,000 to 20,000




FOLLOW

Post Graduate Institute of Medical Education and Research, Chandigarh (PGIMER Chandigarh) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Nurse Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the GNM can grab this chance and apply for the PGIMER Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Chandigarh.

PGIMER Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Project Nurse 	01	GNM

Age Limit for the PGIMER Recruitment 2025 

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 30 years.

Selection Process for the PGIMER Recruitment 2025 

Interview

Salary Structure for the PGIMER Recruitment 2025 

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 20,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the PGIMER Recruitment 2025 

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the PGIMER Recruitment 2025 
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Project Nurse Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form carefully.
Then, send the application form along with the relevant documents to the address given below.

Address

NICU office, Room No. 05, Level III, F-Block, Nehru Hospital, PGIMER, Chandigarh.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	18-08-2025
Last Date of Application	25-08-2025
Application form	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here

Join on Telegram	Join Now
